= Introduction =

The Fusion Chrtas have the ability to render charts in HTML 5. This features is very useful to be used in web application for desktop and iPhone/iPad at the same time. To enable this feature internally the fusion charts library use the <a href="http://www.highcharts.com/">Highcharts</a> library.
